global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Slope Sea 1 (SS-1) line 2019-05-16T23:37:11 UTC and lost at sea 2019-07-28. The glider was staged for normal recovery operations on 2019-07-27 and mysteriously stopped calling in. There is no recovered data available for this deployment, only telemetered.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 1000m Slocum Glider cp_336
